titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives in support of providing fair and up-to-date teaching in United States secondary schools of the developments of modern day Russia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 12/14/2005--Introduced. Applauds public and private school officials who are trying to improve the history curriculum in secondary schools in the United States Calls on school officials to reexamine such curriculum to ensure fair and up-to-date teaching of the developments of modern day Russia. Calls on publishers of history textbooks to include more information and additional points of view regarding Russian history in new versions of textbooks or as supplementary materials.
